mapper.select: select userid,username,phone,birthday,e.classname educlass from member m inner join educlass e on m.educlass=e.num where grade='student'
select m.userid,username,phone,birthday,e.classname educlass,adate applicantDate from member m inner join applicant a on m.userid=a.userid inner join educlass e on a.num=e.num
mapper.update: update member set educlass=(select num from applicant where userid=#{id}), grade='student'
update member set grade='member' where educlass=#{num}
